Name: Holiday Mania
About the game: Holiday Mania is an Indie platformer game that is based on some of the big holidays of the calendar year, these holidays include Valentines day, St. Patricks, Easter, Halloween and Christmas. To complete these levels players need to collect a number of items in each of the levels. Pickups in each level: Valentines: Big Hearts St. Patricks: 4-leaf Clovers Easter: Easter eggs Halloween: Candy Christmas: Presents
Meta Title: Holiday Mania: Sep 13, 2020, Conor Davis and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Holiday Mania? Check out the release date (Sep 13, 2020), developer insights from Conor Davis, and a complete game summary.
